long_description: Rule the slopes in the women's Bolle Duchess snow goggles, which feature an oversized lens and a comfortable fit so you can shred with clear vision all season long. Aurora lens has an amber tint and 42% visible light transmission to increase contrast in cloudy to partly sunny conditions; blue mirror finish helps cut glare. Oversized spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for an extra-wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer thermal lens features a microporous port that allows lens to breathe while preventing moisture entry, greatly reducing fogging. Anti-fog treatment helps prevent inner lens from fogging up and obstructing your view; outer lens features a protective layer to defend lens from scratches. 3-layer face foam has a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Strap outriggers hinge to ensure a flush fit that comfortably distributes pressure evenly across your face. Wide adjustable strap is backed with silicone grippers so it stays in place on your helmet. The helmet-compatible Bolle Duchess women's snow goggles are designed for medium- to small-size faces.
short_description: Rule the slopes in the women's Bolle Duchess snow goggles, which feature an oversized lens and a comfortable fit so you can shred with clear vision all season long.
